price: ૬૪) તે વૃક્ષ જહન્નમની જડ માંથી નીકળે છે.
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Gujarati translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Gujarati by Rabila Al-Umry, published by Birr Institution - Mumbai 2017.

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
